title: Madora's Prophecy
description: In the third thrilling installment, our heroes finally reach the last Unknown Territory, only to be confronted by the final villain! Can they defy the prophecies and stop his plans?After seeing some familiar faces, things aren't looking good for the party! The number two captain takes authority and shows herself to the party, forcing them into combat!  "You! Yes, you! Emotions run wild in this delicious adventure! Read to find out!"
author: Michael  Rogers
